sentences.en: He wanted to join the circus troupe.
Last month the troupe were putting on tour shows in Shanghai.
sentences.cn: 上个月,这个剧团巡回演出到上海.

sentences.en: O Troupe of little vagrants of the world, leave your footprints in my words.
sentences.cn: 世界上的一队小小的漂泊者呀, 请留下你们的足印在我的文字里.

sentences.en: Oscar: Shakespeare's Romeo and It's staged by a famous British theatrical troupe.
sentences.cn: 奥斯卡: 是莎士比亚的《罗密欧与茱丽叶》.由英国著名的剧团上演的.

sentences.en: Some of our people are traveling with the troupe on its tour.
sentences.cn: 我们中的一些人跟随剧团巡回演出.

sentences.en: Suddenly, everyone fell silent as a troupe of armed policemen appeared in the distance.
sentences.cn: 忽然, 大家安静了,远远的来了一队武装的警察.

sentences.en: The acrobatic troupe livened the garden party up immensely.
sentences.cn: 杂技团的表演使游园会大为活跃.

sentences.en: The dragon dance troupe , beating drums and cymbals, entered the outer compound.
sentences.cn: 龙灯随着锣鼓声进来, 停在二门外的大天井里.

sentences.en: The lost actor couldn't wait to identify himself with the troupe.
sentences.cn: 这个失群的演员迫不及待地要去和那些演员认同.

sentences.en: The theatrical troupe is touring the country.
sentences.cn: 剧团正在全国各地巡回演出.

sentences.en: The troupe has agreed to be held over for another stanza.
sentences.cn: 剧团已经同意续演一期.

sentences.en: The troupe produced a new play last night.
sentences.cn: 剧团昨晚上演了一部新剧.

sentences.en: Their troupe is on tour in the South.
sentences.cn: 他们的剧团在南方巡回演出.

sentences.en: This Chinese Troupe is famous for its acrobatics.
sentences.cn: 这个中国马戏团以空中飞行杂技驰名.

sentences.en: When the touring theatrical troupe arrived at the mountain village, the villagers all ran to tell one and another beaming with delight.
sentences.cn: 巡回剧团来到山村,人们笑逐颜开, 奔走相告.

words.tran_cn: 戏团演员；台柱演员；剧团的团员；有经验的演员

trans.tran_en: a group of singers, actors, dancers etc who work together
